question: Which Indian city will get 10,000 CCTV cameras to ensure women's safety?
explanation: As many as 10,000 Artificial Intelligence-powered CCTV cameras will be installed at over 4,500 junctions and main roads across Bengaluru to ensure safety of women. It is Termed as 'Smart Eyes', the security camera system will monitor areas on real-time basis. The Centre recently approved 667 crore for Bengaluru under the Nirbhaya Fund to ensure safety of women in public places.
